title.rendered: Amazon seller analytics with Hiba Weber of seller mobile

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 33:13 — 30.4MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Hiba Weber is the COO of Seller Mobile, an all-inclusive management software for Amazon sellers.

The purpose of having and using software like Seller Mobile is to make sure you streamline the information. 

If you’re an Amazon seller, you need to have a data-driven approach. It’s paramount to look at the right metrics regularly. 

If you want to get a recurring 10% off of Seller Mobile, click here.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The reason why Seller Mobile is better than just going into Seller Central
  • What kind of ASIN level data is important to obtain for your business
  • The importance of inventory management
  • How restocking protects you against lost sales
  • How your advertising impacts your stock
  • How to make cash flow more scientific
  • What Seller Mobile does
